dSignUp module¶

dSignUp.getWorkList()¶

Obtains a list with the name of all the rols in the database sorted by name.

Returns:String List
dSignUp.addUser(username, password, workname)¶

Adds a user in the database.

Parameters:
  • username (String) – Username of the user
  • password (String) – Password of the user
  • workname (String) – Name of the rol selected by the user
Returns:

User object, or None if error
